properties.description: The properties of the bandwidth schedule.

location.description: The location of the device. This is a supported and registered Azure geographical region (for example, West US, East US, or Southeast Asia). The geographical region of a device cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geographical region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

properties.description: The properties of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

tags.description: The list of tags that describe the device. These tags can be used to view and group this device (across resource groups).

encryptionCertThumbprint.description: Thumbprint certificate used to encrypt \"Value\". If the value is unencrypted, it will be null.

containerName.description: Container name (Based on the data format specified, this represents the name of Azure Files/Page blob/Block blob).

dataFormat.description: Storage format used for the file represented by the share.

storageAccountCredentialId.description: ID of the storage account credential used to access storage.

days.description: The days of the week when this schedule is applicable.

start.description: The start time of the schedule in UTC.

stop.description: The stop time of the schedule in UTC.

accessPermission.description: Type of access to be allowed for the client.

dataBoxEdgeDeviceStatus.description: The status of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

description.description: The Description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

friendlyName.description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device name.

modelDescription.description: The description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

customContextTag.description: A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

authentication.description: Encrypted IoT device/IoT edge device connection string.

deviceId.description: ID of the IoT device/edge device.

ioTHostHub.description: Host name for the IoT hub associated to the device.

ioTHostHubId.description: Id for the IoT hub associated to the device.

imageName.description: Name of the IoT edge agent image.

hostPlatform.description: Host OS supported by the IoT role.

ioTDeviceDetails.description: IoT device metadata to which data box edge device needs to be connected.

ioTEdgeAgentInfo.description: Iot edge agent details to download the agent and bootstrap iot runtime.

ioTEdgeDeviceDetails.description: IoT edge device to which the IoT role needs to be configured.

shareMappings.description: Mount points of shares in role(s).

shareId.description: ID of the share mounted to the role VM.

comments.description: Comments related to this status change.

status.description: Status of the order as per the allowed status types.

customContextTag.description: A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

schedule.description: Periodic frequency at which timer event needs to be raised. Supports daily, hourly, minutes, and seconds.

startTime.description: The time of the day that results in a valid trigger. Schedule is computed with reference to the time specified upto seconds. If timezone is not specified the time will considered to be in device timezone. The value will always be returned as UTC time.

topic.description: Topic where periodic events are published to IoT device.

errorManifestFile.description: Indicates the relative path of the error xml for the last refresh job on this particular share or container, if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

inProgressRefreshJobId.description: If a refresh job is currently in progress on this share or container, this field indicates the ARM resource ID of that job. The field is empty if no job is in progress.

lastCompletedRefreshJobTimeInUTC.description: Indicates the completed time for the last refresh job on this particular share or container, if any.This could be a failed job or a successful job.

lastJob.description: Indicates the id of the last refresh job on this particular share or container,if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

accessProtocol.description: Access protocol to be used by the share.

azureContainerInfo.description: Azure container mapping for the share.

clientAccessRights.description: List of IP addresses and corresponding access rights on the share(required for NFS protocol).

monitoringStatus.description: Current monitoring status of the share.

refreshDetails.description: Details of the refresh job on this share.

userAccessRights.description: Mapping of users and corresponding access rights on the share (required for SMB protocol).

tier.description: The SKU tier. This is based on the SKU name.

accountType.description: Type of storage accessed on the storage account.

blobDomainName.description: Blob end point for private clouds.

connectionString.description: Connection string for the storage account. Use this string if username and account key are not specified.

sslStatus.description: Signifies whether SSL needs to be enabled or not.

dataPolicy.description: Data policy of the storage Account.

storageAccountStatus.description: Current status of the storage account

connectionString.description: Connection string based on the symmetric key.

accessType.description: Type of access to be allowed for the user.

userId.description: User ID (already existing in the device).

properties.description: The properties of the bandwidth schedule.
